product_name: Light & Motion Urban 550 Front Bike Light - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Light & Motion Urban 550 bike light pumps out a bright 550 lumens of light for bike commutes and leisurely rides, and recharges via USB cable for convenience. Amber side lights enhance visibility at intersections where a majority of accidents happen. Run times range from 1.5 hrs. on high to 6 hrs. on low; get up to 18 hrs. of use in flash mode. Integrated lithium-ion battery charges via USB in 6 hrs.; charge indicator displays the charge status so you know when to recharge. The Light & Motion Urban 550 bike light is designed to be mounted on your handlebar or helmet; mounting bracket included. Closeout.
short_description: The Light & Motion Urban 550 bike light pumps out a bright 550 lumens of light for bike commutes and leisurely rides, and recharges via USB cable for convenience.
